Enter your email address used to order on Walmart.com, your billing ZIP code and your Walmart.com Order Number (your order number can be found on your confirmation email from Walmart.com or in your Account Order History on Walmart.com).</li></ul>

items.name: 4.25 x 6 Postcard
items.shortDescription: Create a custom gift out of your favorite photo with the 4.25" x 6" Postcard. Your friends and relatives will enjoy receiving this one-of-a-kind customized postcard in the mail. Use it to invite others to upcoming parities or events or to celebrate the recipient's special day. This item features the image of your choice on the front with your own personal message on the back. The personalized postcard can feature a decorative border around the photo that will help enhance the design. Choose the font style and colors that will best represent your message. You can celebrate an upcoming special occasion, send a thank-you note or wish a loved one well. This photo postcard will help add a personal touch to your greeting. It can also be used for birthday and holiday greetings or for wedding invitations and other unique occasions. For this postcard it is recommended to use a 4.25" x 6" photo for best results. The minimum resolution is 900 x 638 pixels.<br>
items.longDescription: <strong>Features of 4.25" x 6" Postcard:</strong><ul><li>The minimum recommended resolution for a 4.25" x 6" card is 900 x 638 pixels</li><li>Choose font styles and colors.</li><li>Personalized postcard has the option to add a decorative border.</li><li>Photo on the front with a personal message on the backside.</li><li>Add any 4.25 x 6 image to create a customized picture postcard</li><li>This personalized gift is ideal for thank you cards, special event invitations, get well wishes, birthdays, holidays, or other special occasions</li></ul>

items.categoryPath: Cell Phones/No-Contract Phones & Plans/Prepaid Minutes - Cards
items.shortDescription: <p>Enjoy unlimited talk, text and data with the Straight Talk.</p>
items.longDescription: <b>Straight Talk Unlimited* $45 Text, Talk and Web Access 30-Day Service Direct Account Load</b>:<ul><li>Nationwide service on Straight Talk's reliable networks</li><li>No activation, reactivation, cancellation, daily access or overage fees30-day plan</li><li>Unlimited data*, first 5GB of data at high speeds, then 64Kbps</li><li>Unlimited minutes</li><li>Unlimited text or multimedia messages</li><li>Calls to 411 at no additional charge</li></ul><br><b>You must be a current Straight Talk Customer and be on the $45 plan to purchase this product</b><br>To change from another plan to this plan, please call Straight Talk customer care before purchasing at 1-877-430-CELL(2355) or visit <a href="http://www.straighttalk.com">StraightTalk.com</a> to change your plan prior to purchase.<br><br><b>After Purchase & FAQ</b><ul><li>You will receive a confirmation email from Walmart.com upon placing a successful order.</li><li>A second email from <b>walmartonline@e-deliverygroup.com</b> will instruct you to load the airtime directly to your Straight Talk account. The ONLY option for redemption will be a <b>'LOAD NOW'</b> button, which requires you to input your cellphone number upon redemption. Your airtime will then be loaded to your account. NO PIN will be delivered. If you wish to purchase a PIN redemption card, click <a href="http://www.walmart.com/ip/Straight-Talk-Monthly-Plan-Unlimited-30-Access-Days-45/45111496">HERE</a>.</li><li>Follow the redemption instructions carefully until you receive confirmation that your airtime has been loaded successfully to the device. Confirmation message will be displayed upon successful redemption of pin.</li><li>You will need to redeem the value to your account within 10 days of purchase or your order will be canceled and the amount refunded.</li><li>To view frequently asked questions about this product visit <a href="http://www.walmart.e-deliverygroup.com/faq.html">www.walmart.e-deliverygroup.com/faq.html</a>.</li><li>Note: Pin will not be printable or giftable from the Digital Delivery Center. There are no returns or refunds on electronically fulfilled airtime. Walmart.com is not responsible for stolen or misplaced redemption emails.<br><br><b>*</b>30 day Unlimited Plan includes first 5GB of data at high speed per 30 day cycle. After 5GB, your data speed will be reduced for the remainder of the 30 day cycle. High speed data is restored once a new 30 day service plan is added. Other limitations, terms and conditions of service apply. Straight Talk reserves the right to terminate your service for unauthorized or abnormal usage. Please refer to the Terms and Conditions of Service .<br><br><b>***</b>Redemption emails are usually delivered in minutes or, at most, within 48 hours depending on additional order validation required by Wal-Mart or your credit card company.</li></ul>

items.name: RCA 7" Tablet 16GB Quad Core.
items.shortDescription: <p>Introducing the RCA 7 Voyager II 7-inch Google Certified Tablet. Operating on Android's sweetest operating system yet, Android 5.0 (Lollipop), you can enjoy more of what the Google Play store has to offer, whether you're into gaming, social apps, music, movies or are looking for the latest productivity app. Share a smile with friends and family using the tablet's front camera. Use the tablet's built-in Bluetooth capability to connect and pair with compatible devices. Whether taking in a movie, playing a favorite game or surfing the Web, the RCA tablet's quad-core processor and 16GB flash-storage provide an excellent portable experience.</p>
items.longDescription: <b>RCA 7 Voyager II with WiFi 7" Touchscreen Tablet PC:</b><br><br><b>Technical Specifications:</b><br><br><ul><li>1.3GHz Quad-Core processor</li><li>1GB DDR of system memory</li><li>7.0" touchscreen, 1024 x 600 resolution</li><li>Built-in WiFi and Bluetooth v4.0</li></ul><b>Additional Features:</b><ul><li>Front 1MP webcam</li><li>microUSB 2.0 port, headphone jack, microphone jack</li><li>16GB onboard storage memory, additional memory via microSD card slot</li><li>Rechargeable lithium-ion battery</li><li>Weighs 0.61 lbs; 7.3" x 0.5" x 4.5" dimensions</li></ul><b>Software and Applications:</b><ul><li>Android 5.0 OS (Lollipop)</li><li>Media Formats: popular media formats</li></ul><b>What's in the Box:</b><ul><li>Tablet, battery and AC adapter</li></ul><br><b>What's a Tablet PC?</b><br><br>Tablet PCs are compact, ultra-portable entertainment devices that let you read email, surf the Internet, read eBooks, view photos, play games, listen to music and watch video files. Most tablets are based on a smaller operating system, which allows you to purchase and download additional applications from supported stores. Tablet PCs do not have a CD/DVD drive and will not run Microsoft Windows or its applications. Tablet PCs function as a secondary device for casual entertainment purposes, and are not meant to replace a computer. They are ideal for use around the home and on the go with WiFi or 3-4G mobile broadband connections (pay as you go, contract may be required for service).

We recommend you use the installed software to create your own restore and backup DVD the first week you use the computer.</li></ul><br><b>What's In The Box:</b><ul><li>Power cord and AC adapter</li><li>3-Cell battery</li><li>Quick Start Guide</li></ul><br><b><i>To see the manufacturer's specifications for this product, click <a href="http://i.walmart.com/i/rb/0088989418355.pdf" target="_blank">here</a>.<br><br>To see a list of our PC Accessories, click <a href="http://www.walmart.com/cp/accessories-peripherals/132959" target="_blank">here</a>.<br><br>Trade in your used computer and electronics for more cash to spend at Walmart. items.name: The Angry Birds Movie (Blu-ray + DVD + Digital HD)
items.longDescription: In this hilarious animated adventure comedy, you'll finally find out why the birds are so angry. In an island paradise populated entirely by happy, flightless birds _ or almost entirely, Red, a bird with a temper problem, speedy Chuck, and the volatile Bomb have always been outsiders. But when the island is visited by mysterious green piggies, it's up to these unlikely outcasts to figure out what the pigs are up to. Featurettes Include: Making Music with Composer Heitor Pereira Pig's Theme", "In-Theater Policy Trailers Join Your Friends", "In-Theater Policy Trailers A Gift Card For Chuck", "Hatchling Shorts Mother's Day", "Creating the Real World of Angry Birds", "Making Music with Composer Heitor Pereira Red's Theme", "Making Music with Composer Heitor Pereira Chuck's Theme", "Making Music with Composer Heitor Pereira Red's Anger Theme", "Making Music with Composer Heitor Pereira Mission Theme", "Making Music with Composer Heitor Pereira Action Music!", "In-Theater Policy Trailers Silence Your Birdphone", "Hatchlings! Holiday", "Meet The Pigs", "Hatchlings! Early Hatchling Gets the Worm", "Hatchlings! Easter", "Meet the Birds", "Crafty Birds", "Meet The Hatchlings"; Photo Gallery; Blake Shelton "Friends" Music Video; Deleted Scenes. Languages: English, French, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian, Swedish, Danish, Norwegian, Finnish, Estonian, Lithuanian, Cantonese, Mandarin, Korean, Thai and Ukrainian; Subtitles: English, French, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian, Swedish, Danish, Norwegian, Finnish, Estonian, Lithuanian, Cantonese, Mandarin, Indonesian, Korean, Thai, Ukrainian and Vietnamese.
